segments.text: I see the kitchen with the sink overflowing on the right side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out from the faucet and spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there, drying a plate with a towel, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, there are stacks of dishes on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window above the sink, I can see a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now looking left, there's a boy climbing on a stool in front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really wobbly, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar with one hand and holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, reaching up as if she's waiting for a cookie from him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are open, and the jar is full of cookies inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels so chaotic inside compared to the calm garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR
